name: CALIFORNIA SCHOOLS VOLUNTARY EMPLOYEE BENEFITS ASSOCIATION (VEBA)
description: Non-profit group purchaser of health care for public employees.
sampleDescriptions: Lobbying for the repeal of the ACA surtax on employer sponsored health plans, commonly known as the "Cadillac Tax". HR 174; S 56
Lobbying for the repeal of the ACA surtax on employer sponsored health plans, commonly known as the "Cadillac Tax". HR 174; S 56
